Rulings.Tengu:
● You can't activate this card if you have no monsters that can be Normal Summoned/Set in your Deck.
● You can't activate this card while "Vanity's Fiend" is applying.
● If you reveal a card that can't be Summoned because EG "Power Filter" is applying, send all cards to the GY.
Rulings.Goat:
●If you pick up a Spirit Monster, you cannot Special Summon it and it is sent to the GY.
●If you pick up a Guardian and don't have the corresponding Equip Spell Card on the field, you cannot Special Summon the Guardian and it is sent to the GY. If you have the corresponding Equip Spell Card, the Guardian is Special Summoned.
●If you go through your whole Deck without finding a card to pick up, Monster Gate's effect is negated and the cards you picked up are shuffled back into the Deck.
●Your opponent can chain Royal Oppression's effect to negate Monster Gate's effect.
●Cards picked up that cannot be Normal Summoned are considered sent to the GY, not discarded.
●If you Special Summon Dark Magician of Chaos with Monster Gate, the effect of Dark Magician of Chaos activates, but it activates after Monster Gate has fully resolved and sent other picked up cards to the GY, so you can use Dark Magician of Chaos' effect to retrieve a Spell Card that was picked up and sent to the GY by Monster Gate in the process of searching for the Dark Magician of Chaos.

● If you pick up a Guardian and don't have the corresponding Equip Spell Card on the field, you can't Special Summon the Guardian and it is sent to the GY. If you have the corresponding Equip Spell Card, the Guardian is Special Summoned.
● If you go through your whole Deck without finding a card to pick up, 'Monster Gate''s effect is negated and the cards you picked up are shuffled back into the Deck.
● Your opponent can chain 'Royal Oppression''s effect to negate 'Monster Gate''s effect.
● Cards picked up that can't be Normal Summoned are considered 'sent to the GY', not 'discarded'.

Rulings.Base:
1. If you pick up a Spirit Monster, you cannot Special Summon it and it is sent to the GY.
2. If you pick up a Guardian and don't have the corresponding Equip Spell Card on the field, you cannot Special Summon the Guardian and it is sent to the GY. If you have the corresponding Equip Spell Card, the Guardian is Special Summoned.
3. If you go through your whole Deck without finding a card to pick up, the effect of "Monster Gate" is negated and the cards you picked up are shuffled back into the Deck.
4. Your opponent can chain the effect of "Royal Oppression" to negate the effect of "Monster Gate".
5. Cards picked up that cannot be Normal Summoned are considered 'sent to the GY', not 'discarded'.
6. If you Special Summon "Dark Magician of Chaos" with "Monster Gate", the effect of "Dark Magician of Chaos" activates, but it activates after "Monster Gate" has fully resolved and sent other picked up cards to the GY, so you can use the effect of "Dark Magician of Chaos" to retrieve a Spell Card that was picked up and sent to the GY by "Monster Gate" in the process of searching for the "Dark Magician of Chaos".
